data.eml:eml: Contributions to the knowledge of Umbrageocoris (Heteroptera: Lygaeoidea: Geocoridae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kóbor, Péter (2019): Contributions to the knowledge of Umbrageocoris (Heteroptera: Lygaeoidea: Geocoridae). Zootaxa 4652 (2): 384-390, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4652.2.11
